TP Pete.notes: [[TP Pete]] is found in [[Worlds#S2 - Rats Nest|Rat's Nest]], the second zone of the sewers.

Secretkeeper.notes: The [[Secretkeeper]] is a [[Secrets|Secret]] character, only found in the tutorial area.

Sprout.notes: [[Sprout]] is found in [[Worlds#T1 - The Base Of The Bark|The Base of the Bark]], the first zone of the tree, located at the top right of the area.

Town Marble.notes: [[Town Marble]] is found in the [[Worlds#G1 - Blunder Hills|starting town]], located in the top section of the area.

Obol Altar.notes: The [[Obol Altar]] appears in both [[Worlds#F2 - Encroaching Forest Villas|Encroaching Forest Villas]] and [[Worlds#D0 - YumYum Grotto|YumYum Grotto]].

Woodsman.notes: The [[Woodsman]] is found in [[Worlds#G2 - Spore Meadows|Spore Meadows]], the first zone to the right of the starting town, located next to an oak tree with a stump next to him.

Scripticus.notes: [[Scripticus]] is the first NPC you interact with after the tutorial, located to the right in the [[Worlds#G1 - Blunder Hills|starting town]].

Krunk.notes: [[Krunk]] is found in [[Worlds#M2 - Freefall Caverns|Freefall Caverns]], the second zone of the mines, located at the bottom of the area.

Glumlee.notes: [[Glumlee]] is located in the [[Worlds#M1 - Tunnels Entrance|Tunnels Entrance]] to the left of the [[Worlds#G1 - Blunder Hills|starting town]].

Picnic Stowaway.notes: The [[Picnic Stowaway]] is found in [[Worlds#G3 - Froggy Fields|Froggy Fields]], the second zone of Grasslands, located in the bottom left of the area.

Hamish.notes: [[Hamish]] is found in [[Worlds#G3 - Froggy Fields|Froggy Fields]], the second zone of Grasslands, located in the bottom of the area.

Mr Pigibank.notes: [[Mr Pigibank]] is found in the [[Worlds#G1 - Blunder Hills|starting town]], located at the top section of the area.

Promotheus.notes: [[Promotheus]] is found in [[Worlds#G4 - Valley Of The Beans|Valley of the Beans]], the third zone of Grasslands, located in the middle left side of the area.

Bushlyte.notes: [[Bushlyte]] is hidden within the [[Worlds#J3 - Vegetable Patch|Vegetable Patch]]. See [[Secrets]] for more details.

Rocklyte.notes: [[Rocklyte]] is hidden within [[Worlds#G3 - Froggy Fields|Froggy Fields]]. In order to find him, you must complete [[Bushlyte|Bushlyte's]] quests. See [[Secrets]] for more details.

Cactolyte.notes: [[Cactolyte]] is hidden within Djonnuttown. See [[Secrets]] for more details.

Stiltzcho.notes: [[Stiltzcho]] is found in [[Worlds#J1 - Jungle Perimeter|Jungle Perimeter]], the first zone of the Jungle, located to the left of the area. His quests can be considered a DPS and skill check for progressing [[Scripticus]]' questline. Dropping a [[Grass Leaf]] on him is a possible daily [[Tasks#Blunder Hills|Task]].

Funguy.notes: [[Funguy]] is found in [[Worlds#J2 - Winding Willows|Winding Willows]], the second zone of the Jungle, located in the bottom left of the area. Saying 'hi' to him is a possible daily [[Tasks#Blunder Hills|Task]].

Tiki Chief.notes: [[Tiki Chief]] is found in [[Worlds#F2 - Encroaching Forest Villas|Encroaching Forest Villas]], the second zone of the Forest, located at the top right of the area. One of the only sources for the [[File:Kachow_Statue.png|36px]] [[Kachow Statue]].

Builder Bird.notes: [[Builder Bird]] is found in the [[Worlds#G1 - Blunder Hills|starting town]], located in the top right section of the area.

Constructor Crow.notes: [[Constructor Crow]] is found in the top left of [[Worlds#D0 - YumYum Grotto|YumYum Grotto]], next to the portal to World 3.

Papua Piggea.notes: [[Papua Piggea]] is found in [[Worlds#F3 - Tucked Away|Tucked Away]], the third zone of the Forest, located at the bottom left of the area.

Desert Davey.notes: [[Desert Davey]] is the [[Tasks|Taskmaster]] of Yum-Yum Desert. You can find him in [[Worlds#D0 - YumYum Grotto|YumYum Grotto]].

Mutton.notes: [[Mutton]] is found in [[Worlds#M2 - Freefall Caverns|Freefall Caverns]], the second zone of the mines, located in the middle of the area.

Speccius.notes: [[Speccius]] is found in [[Worlds#D4 - Dessert Dunes|Dessert Dunes]].

Fishpaste97.notes: [[Fishpaste97]] is found in [[Worlds#F2- Faraway Piers|Faraway Piers]].

Scubidew.notes: [[Scubidew]] is found in [[Worlds#F2- Faraway Piers|Faraway Piers]].

Whattso.notes: [[Whattso]] is found in [[Worlds#F1 - Salty Shores|Salty Shores]], to the left of town.

Postboy Pablob.notes: [[Postboy Pablob]] is found in [[Worlds#D0 - YumYum Grotto|YumYum Grotto]].

Bandit Bob.notes: [[Bandit Bob]] is found in [[Worlds#D3 - Bandit Bob's Hideout|Bandit Bob's Hideout]]. His quests require you to open up the 2nd [[Smithing]] tab, unlock recipes from [[Tasks]], and open the [[Post Office]].

Carpetiem.notes: [[Carpetiem]] is found in the [[Worlds#D8 - Slamabam Straightaway|Slamabam Straightaway]].

Djonnut.notes: [[Djonnut]] is found in [[Worlds#D12 - Djonnuttown|Djonnuttown]], by the door to the [[Efaunt]] boss fight.

Goldric.notes: [[Goldric]] is found in [[Worlds#D6 - Shifty Sandbox|Shifty Sandbox]]. In order to get any quests from Goldric, you must have gotten far enough in the [[Cowbo Jones]] questline by completing three quests for [[Bandit Bob]]. Until you've completed the requisite quests, Goldric refuses to talk to you.

Meel.notes: [[Meel]] is found in The Crypt, a hidden area past [[Worlds#S3 - The Office|The Office]] in the Sewers. See [[Secrets#The_Crypt|Secrets]] for more details.

Snake Jar.notes: [[Snake Jar]] sits at the bottom of [[Worlds#D2 - The Mimic Hole|The Mimic Hole]], near the portal to [[Bandit Bob]].

Loominadi.notes: [[Loominadi]] is found in [[Worlds#D10 - Up Up Down Down|Up Up Down Down]].

Wellington.notes: [[Wellington]] is found in [[Worlds#D11 - Sands of Time|Sands of Time]].

Dazey.notes: [[Dazey]] is found in [[Worlds#T2 - Hollowed Trunk|Hollowed Trunk]], the second zone of the tree, located at the top right of the area.

Cowbo Jones.notes: [[Cowbo Jones]] is on the righthand side of [[Worlds#D0 - YumYum Grotto|YumYum Grotto]], near the portal to [[Worlds#D2 - Jar Bridge|Jar Bridge]]. He facilitates the main questline in Yum-Yum Desert much the same way [[Scripticus]] does in Blunder Hills.

Typhoon.notes: [[Typhoon]] is found in [[Worlds#G3 - Froggy Fields|Froggy Fields]], the second zone of Grasslands, located in the top right of the area next to the [[Colosseum/Dewdrop|Dewdrop Colosseum]].

Centurion.notes: [[Centurion]] is located in [[Worlds#D2 - The Mimic Hole|The Mimic Hole]], next to the [[Colosseum/Sandstone|Sandstone Colosseum]].

XxX Cattleprod XxX.notes: [[XxX Cattleprod XxX]] is found in [[Worlds#D5 - The Grandioso Canyon|The Grandioso Canyon]].

Giftmas Blobulyte.notes: '''Every day during Giftmas, you'll get to give ME gifts!! Hey dont gimme dat look! Not every event needs to be centered around you, ya know!'''

Telescope.notes: The [[Telescope]] is found in [[Worlds#T3 - Where the Branches End|Where the Branches End]], the third zone of the tree, located at the top left of the area.

Loveulyte.notes: '''Roses are red, blobulytes are cute, go run my errands and I'll give you some loot!'''

Egggulyte.notes: '''Im Eg,' 'I'm Egg,' 'I'm... wait which one am I again?'''

Iceland Irwin.notes: [[Iceland Irwin]] is the [[Tasks|Taskmaster]] of Frostbite Tundra. You can find him in [[Worlds#Frostbite Towndra|Frostbite Towndra]].

Hoggindaz.notes: [[Hoggindaz]] is found in [[Worlds#Frostbite Towndra|Frostbite Towndra]], at the bottom right of town.

Bill Brr.notes: [[Bill Brr]] is located in the [[Worlds#Overpass of Sound|Overpass of Sound]].

Lonely Hunter.notes: [[Lonely Hunter]] is found in [[Worlds#Snowfield Outskirts|Snowfield Outskirts]], next to [[Colosseum/Chillsnap|Chillsnap Colosseum]].

Lord of the Hunt.notes: [[Lord of the Hunt]] is located in [[Worlds#Trappers Folly|Trappers Folly]], to the left of W3 Town.

Snouts.notes: [[Snouts]] is hanging around in [[Worlds#The Stache Split|The Stache Split]].

Coastiolyte.notes: '''Cmon bro go get yourself some of that summer action!! I wanna see you opening those coolers like no other!'''

Walupiggy.notes: See the [https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBG_WXgv7iS7UtkCmTxAL_-nH8V4ldufF Legends of Idleon Youtube Channel] for more details.

Toadstall.notes: [[Toadstall]] is found in [[Worlds#Grandfrog's Backyard|Grandfrog's Backyard]], accessible from the bottom left of the [[Frog]] map. He introduces the player to the Party mechanic and is also the shopkeeper within Grandfrog's Gazebo, the first [[Dungeons|Party Dungeon]].

Gangster Gus.notes: [[Gangster Gus]] is found in [[Worlds#Heaty Hole|Heaty Hole]], accessible from the bottom of the [[Mimic]] map. He is also the shopkeeper within Crypt of Snakenhotep, the second [[Dungeons|Party Dungeon]].

Falloween Pumpkin.notes: ''A jackolantern in November bet you weren't expecting that!''
